description: Smart code formatting based on file type. Automatically formats code using Prettier, Black, gofmt, rustfmt, and other language-specific formatters.

hooks.command: if [[ "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.js || "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.ts || "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.jsx || "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.tsx || "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.json || "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.css || "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.html ]]; then npx prettier --write "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.py ]]; then black "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.go ]]; then gofmt -w "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.rs ]]; then rustfmt "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.php ]]; then php-cs-fixer fix "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; fi
